name: Galerie Kreo
profile:
The galerie kreo is located in the 13th arrondissement in Paris, a neighbourhood which has become the focal point for art of today in the city.
Didier Krzentowski, an Expert in Design and contemporary art, has brought together a collection of furniture and objects by internationally reknowned contemporary designers.
The galerie kreo sees itself as a « laboratory-space » dedicated to the research of the artists involved and has exclusive international rights to limited edition pieces by such luminaries as Ronan & Erwan Bouroullec, Marc Newson and Martin Szekely.
The galerie kreo has recently moved into other areas such as publishing, in tandem with Bernard Ruiz-Picasso’s Images Modernes.
